name: AVCaptureAudioPreviewOutput
desc: A capture output that provides preview playback for audio being recorded in a capture session.

items.name: var outputDeviceUniqueID: String?
items.desc: Indicates the unique ID of the Core Audio output device being used to play preview audio.

items.name: var volume: Float
items.desc: Indicates the preview volume of the output.

items.name: init()
items.desc: Creates a new audio preview output.
